name: Victoria
greetingText: I like your name by the way!
text1: It is your Birthday by the way!
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday to you! Happy bithday dear...
text2: This is what I was to say to you.
text3: But because of the distance between us.
text4: I want to say it in a
wishText: PS: Happy Birthday Victoria as you turn a year older Don't remember what I said about this picture. Just enjoy yourself!.
outroText: When we meet in church just tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or Tap here to watch it again.
